ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] ROK city
ygData.msgSnippet: The Hail range is smaller than normal say range.  I have found that you need to be up close and personal with NPC s when you hail them.  This guy is the
ygData.messageBody:
The "Hail" range is smaller than normal "say" range. I have found that you
need to be up close and personal with NPC's when you "hail" them. This guy
is the banker too. Has a name that is like Wellsian Faragan (or something
to allude to Wells Fargo.) He has bracketed key words but also has some
"hidden" ones too.

The differences we see in mob agro behavior is probably mostly the level
difference factor.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Papa Legba" <legba@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 08, 2000 8:34 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] ROK city


> Thanks for the help :)
> >
> > * Yes * And talk to the guy banker - he talks about giving you
something "a
> > composer" left with him.
>
> Woohoo, a quest! I was being total newbie dork last night. Hailing
> every thing I could find! I guess I missed his store, I will keep
> looking.
